name: Pro Helicopter Simulator 4k
description:
Pro Helicopter Simulator is the definitive word on flight simulation! With 3D models from helicopters and airports, enjoy this amazing simulation on New York City! Control the weather conditions, night and day and more!

Fly your helicopter from the cockpit or from outside. Use trims, gear, control the lights, everything you need to master all techniques necessary to fly a aircraft!

This is the most real flight simulator there is! Feel just like a helicopter pilot!

MAIN FEATURES:
- 18 helicopters, free and by purchase.
- Very detailed New York city, with buildings and real airports.
- More than 300 created missions.
- Weather conditions and day and night.
- Fully controllable aircrafts, real cockpits and models.
- Flight simulator very close to real life experience.

Have a nice flight pilot!
